content: What are the boundaries between ObservationDefinition and a simple profile on Observation? For example, the Vitals profile on Observation could equally be an ObservationDefinition couldn't it?
BTW - I meant one of the profiles - eg BodyWeight

Yes that my biggest criticism with the way ObservationDefinition has been modeled. I created a tracker to address this issue. See this discussion and referenced chat regarding this: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/103-Orders-and.20Observation.20WG/subject/ObservationDefinition.20does.20not.20work.20for.20the.20simple.20stuff
Is the consensus to use Observations profiles instead of ObservationDefinition? If so, what is the purpose of ObservationDefinition?
ObservationDefinition is "data" - it allows you to query a master-file of Observations. A profile defines the appearance of other data.
